#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int rem = n,rem2,k;
    for(int i=0;i<=(n/5);i++)
    {
        rem = n-(5*i);
        for(int j=0;j<=(rem/3);j++)
        {
            rem2 = rem-j*3;
            if(rem2%2==0)
            {
                k = rem2/2;
                printf("%d %d %d\n",i,j,k);
            }
        }
    }
return 0;
}
